name: Goodboy Galaxy
overview: Goodboy Galaxy is a game in development for Game Boy Advance, PC and Nintendo Switch. It's an exploration focused platform game similar to Metroid or Cave Story. With his home world on the brink of ecological collapse, Maxwell bravely hopped into his experimental ship in dogged pursuit of a solution. Beyond the point of no return, holding out forlorn hope, he finds himself stranded - thousands of lightyears from home, at the edge of a hostile galaxy. Help Maxwell explore unfamiliar worlds, make strange new friends and contend with mysterious forces.
